content.title: Spiritually Curious?
content.description: We all have big questions, and exploring big answers can feel overwhelming—or just weird. Check out some stories from people exploring spirituality at The Meeting House.

image1.alt: Woman outside looking at her phone.
Man sitting looking at his phone.

content.text1: We all have big questions, and exploring big answers can feel overwhelming—or just weird. At The Meeting House we think the best thing we have to offer is to point you towards Jesus. On this page you'll find stories, videos, and other materials to help you get to who we are and what we are all about.

As God on earth, Jesus came to show us God's love, save us from sin, set up God's kingdom, and shut down religion so we can share in God's life together. Starting to ask questions about spirituality and faith? We think Jesus is the best place to start.
As you may have noticed we aren’t ashamed to let you know that we think Jesus is pretty great. If you are interested in learning more about who we are, check out these links:
